name.ar,bg,cs,de,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_4: Red Boy And Blue Girl Game
name.am,ca,fa,fi,hi,ja,mr,ta: Red Boy And Blue Girl Online Game
name.bn,et,he,id,sl: Red Boy And Blue Girl Online
name.da,el,gu,hr,sv,sw,te,th: Red Boy And Blue Girl Unblocked Game

short.ar: عليك أن تمر المستويات معا كما النار الصبي الأحمر والماء الأزرق فتاة في المعبد الغامض.
short.am: በሚስጥራዊው ቤተመቅደስ ውስጥ እንደ ቀይ ልጅ እሳት እና እንደ ውኃ ሰማያዊ ልጃገረድ ደረጃውን አንድ ላይ ማለፍ አለብዎት.
short.bg: Трябва да премине нивата заедно като червено момче огън и вода синьо момиче в мистериозния храм.
short.bn: রহস্যময় মন্দিরে লাল ছেলে আগুন এবং জল নীল মেয়ে হিসাবে আপনাকে একসাথে স্তরগুলি পাস করতে হবে।
short.ca: Heu de passar els nivells junts com el noi vermell foc i la noia blava d'aigua al misteriós temple.
short.cs: Musíte projít úrovně společně jako červený chlapec oheň a voda modrá dívka v tajemném chrámu.
short.da: Du skal passere niveauerne sammen som den røde dreng ild og vandblå pige i det mystiske tempel.
short.de: Du musst die Level zusammen als rotes Jungenfeuer und wasserblaues Mädchen im mysteriösen Tempel passieren.
short.el: Πρέπει να περάσετε τα επίπεδα μαζί καθώς το κόκκινο αγόρι φωτιά και το μπλε κορίτσι του νερού στον μυστηριώδη ναό.
short.en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,lt,pt_BR,pt_: You have to pass the levels together as the red boy fire and water blue girl in the mysterious temple.
short.es: Tienes que pasar los niveles juntos como el niño rojo fuego y la niña azul agua en el misterioso templo.
short.et: Te peate läbima tasemed koos kui punane poiss tuli ja vesisinine tüdruk salapärases templis.
short.fa: شما باید به تصویب سطوح با هم به عنوان آتش پسر قرمز و آب دختر آبی در معبد مرموز.
short.fi: Sinun on läpäistävä tasot yhdessä punaisena poikana tulen ja vedensinisenä tyttönä salaperäisessä temppelissä.
short.fil: Kailangan mong pumasa sa mga antas nang sama-sama ang pulang batang lalaki at asul na babae sa mahiwagang templo.
short.fr: Vous devez passer les niveaux ensemble comme le garçon rouge feu et l’eau fille bleue dans le temple mystérieux.
short.gu: લાલ છોકરો અગ્નિ અને રહસ્યમય મંદિરમાં પાણીની વાદળી છોકરી તરીકે તમારે સ્તરોને એક સાથે પસાર કરવું પડશે.
short.he: אתה צריך לעבור את הרמות יחד כמו הילד האדום אש ומים כחולה ילדה במקדש המסתורי.
short.hi: आप रहस्यमय मंदिर में लाल लड़के आग और पानी नीली लड़की के रूप में एक साथ स्तरों को पारित करने के लिए है।
short.hr: Morate proći razine zajedno kao crveni dječak vatra i voda plava djevojka u tajanstvenom hramu.
short.hu: Együtt kell haladnotok a szinteken, mint a vörös fiú tűz és vízkék lány a titokzatos templomban.
short.id: Anda harus melewati level bersama-sama sebagai anak laki-laki merah api dan gadis biru air di kuil misterius.
short.it: Devi passare i livelli insieme come il fuoco del ragazzo rosso e la ragazza blu acqua nel misterioso tempio.
short.ja: あなたは神秘的な寺院で赤い男の子の火と水の青い女の子として一緒にレベルを渡す必要があります。
short.kn: ನಿಗೂಢ ದೇವಾಲಯದಲ್ಲಿ ಕೆಂಪು ಹುಡುಗ ಬೆಂಕಿ ಮತ್ತು ನೀರಿನ ನೀಲಿ ಹುಡುಗಿಯಾಗಿ ನೀವು ಒಟ್ಟಿಗೆ ಮಟ್ಟಗಳನ್ನು ದಾಟಬೇಕು.
short.ko: 신비한 사원에서 빨간 소년 불과 물 파란 소녀로 함께 레벨을 통과해야합니다.
short.lv: Jums ir jānokārto līmeņi kopā, kad sarkanais zēns noslēpumainajā templī uguņo un ūdens zilā meitene.
short.ml: നിഗൂഢമായ ക്ഷേത്രത്തിലെ ചുവന്ന പയ്യൻ തീയും ജലനീല പെൺകുട്ടിയുമായി നിങ്ങൾ ഒരുമിച്ച് ലെവലുകൾ കടന്നുപോകണം.
short.mr: रहस्यमय मंदिरात लाल मुलाची आग आणि पाणी निळी मुलगी म्हणून आपल्याला एकत्रितपणे पातळी पार करावी लागेल.
short.ms: Anda harus melewati tingkat bersama-sama sebagai anak merah api dan air biru gadis di kuil misterius.
short.nl: Je moet de levels samen passeren als het rode jongensvuur en het waterblauwe meisje in de mysterieuze tempel.
short.no: Du må passere nivåene sammen som den røde gutten brann og vannblå jente i det mystiske tempelet.
short.pl: Musisz przejść poziomy razem jako czerwony chłopiec ognia i błękitna dziewczyna wody w tajemniczej świątyni.
short.ro: Trebuie să treacă nivelurile împreună ca focul băiat roșu și fata de apă albastru în templu misterios.
short.ru: Вам предстоит пройти уровни вместе, как красный мальчик огонь, так и вода синей девочки в таинственном храме.
short.sk: Musíte prejsť úrovňami spolu ako červený chlapec oheň a voda modré dievča v tajomnom chráme.
short.sl: Moraš prenesti raven skupaj kot rdeč fant ogenj in voda modro dekle v skrivnostnem templju.
short.sv: Du måste passera nivåerna tillsammans som den röda pojken eld och vattenblå tjej i det mystiska templet.
short.sw: Lazima upitishe viwango pamoja kama moto wa mvulana mwekundu na msichana wa bluu wa maji katika hekalu la ajabu.
short.ta: நீங்கள் மர்மமான கோவிலில் சிவப்பு சிறுவன் தீ மற்றும் நீர் நீல பெண் என ஒன்றாக நிலைகள் கடக்க வேண்டும்.
short.te: మర్మమైన దేవాలయంలో ఎరుపు అబ్బాయి అగ్ని మరియు నీరు నీలం అమ్మాయిగా మీరు కలిసి స్థాయిలను దాటాలి.
short.th: คุณต้องผ่านด่านด้วยกันเป็นไฟเด็กสีแดงและสาวสีฟ้าน้ําในวัดลึกลับ
short.tr: Gizemli tapınaktaki kırmızı oğlan ateşi ve su mavisi kız olarak seviyeleri birlikte geçmelisin.
short.uk: Ви повинні пройти рівні разом, як червоний хлопчик вогонь і водяна синя дівчинка в таємничому храмі.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,es,et,fa,fi,f:
Do you like fire and water game! Witness the crazy adventure of this duo and start the fun. Red boy and blue girl game is a great adventure game inspired by fire and water game. In this game you can start the game by choosing one of two different difficulty levels. These types are divided into easy and difficult. While you can complete the easy mode quickly, in the hard mode, the obstacles will accelerate, and you will have to fight better. There are more than twenty levels in the red boy and blue girl game. 

The characters have their characteristics. If you enter the water with Fireboy, your character will be steam; if you enter the fire with your watergirl character, you will lose the game. You must overcome difficulties to get the two characters out of the temple by helping each other. The main objective of the fireboy and watergirl game is to get the two characters locked in the temple out of the temple by collecting diamonds. Each level has diamonds, and when you collect all the diamonds, the temple is unlocked. Therefore, going to the finish line without collecting all the diamonds will not earn you the level. Complete all levels in fireboy and watergirl games by doing good teamwork to win.

How To Play
The red boy and blue girl game can be played both as a two-player and a single-player. You can move your Red Boy character in the temple with the W-A-S-D half. Blue girl character can move on the platform with the help of arrow keys.

Red Boy And Blue Girl Game Features
✓ 2 Different mode
✓ 2D Characters
✓ Easy control
✓ 2D Environment
✓ 5+ Level

Finally, you can enjoy these game for free (and more requests will be added)! Red Boy And Blue Girl Game extension does not contain any hidden ads.

Help and Contact
Contact with us at info@gamebol.com and share your thoughts and problems.
